meanings.definition: To declare with positiveness; affirm; assert.
meanings.sent1: He alleges his innocence in the crime.
meanings.sent2: The witness alleges seeing the accident happen.
meanings.sent3: The cat alleges its ownership of the house.
meanings.sent4: The sun alleges its presence by shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: The scientist alleges the theory is true.
